bio: TSU Faculty of Humanities 2014 - to date (academic year) - 2019-2021 ITVET Academy of Information Technologies - graphic design and web interface course - 2021-to date individual practice in the direction of web development. In the process, I got to know technologies such as: HTML, CSS (SASS, Styled-Components, TailwindCSS, Bootstrap), Javascript(ES6), ReactJS(Redux, Redux-Saga, RTK Query, Zustand, ReactQuery), JWT Authentication/Authorization. Also the basics of NextJS and NodeJS(Express, Mongoose) - which means I can build modern, mobile-friendly, fully interactive applications. Today, I continue to develop and am ready for new challenges and opportunities.
